alert.note: Alert for Hinds; Warren; Yazoo (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued January 18 at 7:58PM CST until January 18 at 8:45PM CST by NWS Jackson
info.description: The National Weather Service in Jackson has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northeastern Warren County in west central Mississippi... Southwestern Yazoo County in central Mississippi... Northwestern Hinds County in central Mississippi... * Until 845 PM CST. * At 758 PM CST, a severe thunderstorm was located near Vicksburg, moving northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Vicksburg, Redwood, Bovina, Brownsville, Phoenix, Youngton, Flowers, Oak Ridge and Satartia. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 1000 PM CST for northeastern Louisiana...and central and west central Mississippi. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
